SELECT * FROM photoboard ORDER BY photoBoardNo desc

SELECT p.* , ar.areaType , ho.houseType , st.styleType , pl.placeType FROM photoboard p INNER JOIN area ar ON p.areaCode = ar.areaCode INNER JOIN house ho ON p.houseCode = ho.houseCode INNER JOIN style st ON p.styleCode = st.styleCode INNER JOIN place pl ON p.placeCode = pl.placeCode WHERE p.photoBoardNo = #{photoBoardNo}

SELECT c.commentNo , c.memberId , c.commentupDate , c.commentContent , c.photoBoardNo , m.memberImg , m.nickName FROM comment c INNER JOIN member m ON c.memberId = m.memberId WHERE c.photoBoardNo = #{photoBoardNo}
SELECT photoBoardNo , photoImg1 FROM photoboard ORDER BY photoBoardNo desc LIMIT #{idx}, 12
SELECT photoimg1 , photoimg2 , photoimg3 , photoimg4 , photoimg5 FROM photoboard WHERE photoBoardNo = #{photoBoardNo}
